title: Step-Back: Shooter Game Level Storyline
description: Use step-back prompting by first asking a broad question about key settings for engaging FPS levels, then use that knowledge to craft a specific one‑paragraph storyline.
step_back_question_hint: key settings for an engaging FPS level
specific_task: Write a one‑paragraph storyline for a challenging FPS game level
hints: Step 1: Ask for 5 key settings that make FPS levels engaging.
Step 2: Use those settings as context to request a specific storyline paragraph.
success_message: Great! You leveraged a general question before the specific task – classic step‑back prompting.

title: Step-Back: Marketing Slogan
description: First ask what makes a memorable eco‑friendly product slogan; then craft a catchy slogan for a reusable water bottle brand.
specific_task: Create a catchy slogan for a reusable water bottle brand
hints: Step 1: Ask a general question identifying principles of eco‑friendly slogans.
Step 2: Using that context, request a slogan for the reusable bottle.
success_message: Excellent use of step‑back prompting to craft a slogan informed by general principles.
